Subject: Graphical Demo Program for 2-neuron Recurrent ANN
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=104426122
X-Yahoo-Profile: zenguyuno

VizANN-1.0 has just been released at the URL below. 
This program shows the detailed workings of a
recurrent binary ANN with two neurons that does the
XOR function.  The program is written in Python; the
Python interpreter is a free download from
http://www.python.org.  It runs on all the Windows and
Linux variants.

The weights for the ANN were found using neuro-
evolution.  Several different sets of weights are
included in VizANN, but they all accomplish the same
result.  I expect to release the neuroevolution
program, written in C, within a couple of weeks.

This program is short, clearly documented, and easy to
use.  (At least I think it is!)

=====
Mitchell Timin
http://annevolve.sourceforge.net
